mapper.select: SELECT seq, type_cd, title, contents, status, parameter, reserve_dt, sent_dt FROM CS_PUSH_RESERVE WHERE status != 1 AND reserve_dt <= DATE_FORMAT( NOW(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') ORDER BY seq ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE CS_PUSH_RESERVE SET sent_dt = #{sentDt}, status = #{status}, upd_usr = #{updUsr}, upd_dt = DATE_FORMAT( NOW(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') WHERE seq = #{seq}

update.foreach: UPDATE CS_PUSH_RESERVE SET sent_dt = #{item.sentDt}, status = #{item.status}, upd_usr = #{item.updUsr}, upd_dt = DATE_FORMAT( NOW(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') WHERE seq = #{item.seq}
